channel.title: firefox OS on Dipankar's blog
channel.description: Recent content in firefox OS on Dipankar's blog

item.title: Firefox operating system released!
item.description: One of the first things that i wanted to implement in my university [~2006] was a operating system with only the Firefox browser as the core application. Turns out that is a popular reality now with the Chromebook and well to some extent the Firefox OS which is being released. I at that point had no idea that mobile would become that big, with the exposure that I had. Its all coming together!

item.title: Compiling B2G on ubuntu 64bit
item.description: Been working on compiling B2G aka Firefox OS on ubuntu 64bit ! There have been some hiccups along the way, but a full post coming up on that soon
